welcome_benefits: Vouchers worth ₹500 on spends of ₹5,000 within 30 days of card issuance. Also, get a 5% cashback on EMI transactions (up to Rs. 1,000) within 30 days of card issuance.

Movie & Dining: “Buy One Get One” offer on movie tickets up to ₹125 while booking with the District app & up to 20% discount on dining at over 1500 restaurants.
Rewards Rate: 3 Reward Points/₹150 Upto Spends of ₹20,000 and 10 Reward Points/₹150 on Spends Above ₹20,000
Reward Redemption: 1 Reward point = ₹0.25 for redemption. These reward points can be redeemed at the Poshvine reward portal or at exclusive merchant stores.
Travel: Complimentary 4 Railway Lounge Access Per Quarter
Domestic Lounge Access: 2 Complimentary Domestic Airport Lounge Access Every Quarter (8 Each Year)
Insurance Benefits: You get an air accident cover worth ₹1 crore, personal accident cover worth upto ₹5,00,000 and a travel insurance cover worth up to ₹22,500

fees_charges.Interest Rates: Ranges between 0.75% to 3.5% per month based upon the credit history of the individual
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% surcharge waived on all fuel purchases at all petrol pumps across India subject to a maximum amount of Rs. 300.

product_details: Gift vouchers worth ₹500 and 5% cashback on EMI transactions as a welcome benefit.
10x Rewards for every ₹150 spent on purchases above ₹20,000.
10x RPs on every ₹150 spent on your birthdays.
3x Rewards on every ₹150 spent on purchases up to ₹20,000
Low interest rate (0.75% – 2.99%) and low foreign currency markup (1.5%)
Complimentary railways and airport lounge access every quarter.
Air accident cover worth ₹1 crore and Personal Accident Cover worth ₹5,00,000
1% fuel surcharge waived on all fuel purchases
